fields.label: Content Panels
fields.name: content_panels
fields.instructions: Add panels here by clicking the "Add New Panel" button at the bottom right side. Panel order can be changed by dragging each up or down.

sub_fields.label: Active/Inactive
sub_fields.name: show_what_is_maker_faire
sub_fields.instructions: This adds an uneditable text panel with information about Maker Faires.

sub_fields.label: Active/Inactive
sub_fields.name: activeinactive
sub_fields.instructions: This adds an email sign up form for newsletter subscriptions.

sub_fields.label: Featured Makers
sub_fields.name: featured_makers
sub_fields.instructions: Adds a panel for 1 row of 4 makers or 2 rows of 4 makers. Each maker features an image, name, and short description. Start by clicking the "Add New Maker" button for each featured maker to show in this panel.

sub_fields.label: Maker Image
sub_fields.name: maker_image
sub_fields.instructions: Featured Maker Images are best when square sizes around 500px by 500px.

sub_fields.label: "More Makers" button
sub_fields.name: more_makers_button
sub_fields.instructions: Optional button to link to a page with more makers. Leave URL field blank to hide.

sub_fields.label: Background Color
sub_fields.name: background_color
sub_fields.instructions: Background color of this panel. Choose blue or red.

sub_fields.label: Featured Makers
sub_fields.name: featured_makers
sub_fields.instructions: Adds a panel for 1 row of 4 makers or 2 rows of 4 makers. Each maker features an image, name, and short description. Start by clicking the "Add New Maker" button for each featured maker to show in this panel.

sub_fields.label: Maker Image
sub_fields.name: maker_image
sub_fields.instructions: Featured Maker Images are best when square sizes around 500px by 500px.

sub_fields.label: "More Makers" button
sub_fields.name: more_makers_button
sub_fields.instructions: Optional button to link to a page with more makers. Leave URL field blank to hide.

sub_fields.label: Featured Events
sub_fields.name: featured_events
sub_fields.instructions: Adds a panel for 4 featured events/exhibits. Each event has an image, name, short description, time, and location/stage. Start by clicking the "Add New Event" button for each featured event in this panel.

sub_fields.label: Event Image
sub_fields.name: event_image
sub_fields.instructions: Featured Event Images are best when square sizes around 500px by 500px.

sub_fields.label: Day of the Week
sub_fields.name: day
sub_fields.instructions: Indicate day or days of the week. i.e. "Saturday" or "Saturday & Sunday"

sub_fields.label: "All Events" button
sub_fields.name: all_events_button
sub_fields.instructions: Optional button to link to a page with more events. Leave URL field blank to hide.

sub_fields.label: Panel Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: i.e. "Latest News" or "News Feed". 20 character limit.

sub_fields.label: Post quantity
sub_fields.name: post_quantity
sub_fields.instructions: Shows the latest 4 posts or latest 8 posts.

sub_fields.label: Items shown in this panel are automatically displayed from "Posts". You can add or update posts by going to "Posts" in the left navigation.
"Become a Sponsor" button
sub_fields.name: become_a_sponsor_button
sub_fields.instructions: Add a URL here to show the "Become a Sponsor" button underneath this sponsor panel.

sub_fields.label: Text
sub_fields.name: text
sub_fields.instructions: Type the CTA message here. 50 character limit.

sub_fields.label: Background Color
sub_fields.name: background_color
sub_fields.instructions: Background color of this panel. Choose blue or red.

sub_fields.label: Column 1
sub_fields.name: column_1
sub_fields.instructions: Use the editor to style this content block however you like.

sub_fields.label: CTA Button Text
sub_fields.name: cta_button
sub_fields.instructions: Optional Call To Action button to add underneath the 2 column content. i.e. "Learn More" or "Buy Now". Centered under both columns. Leave blank to hide.

sub_fields.label: Column 1
sub_fields.name: column_1
sub_fields.instructions: Use the editor to style this content block however you like.

sub_fields.label: Column 2
sub_fields.name: column_2
sub_fields.instructions: Use the editor to style this content block however you like.

sub_fields.label: CTA Button Text
sub_fields.name: cta_button
sub_fields.instructions: Optional Call To Action button to add underneath the 2 column content. i.e. "Learn More" or "Buy Now". Centered under both columns. Leave blank to hide.

sub_fields.label: URL
sub_fields.name: url
sub_fields.instructions: Add a URL here if you want the image to link to another page.

sub_fields.label: URL
sub_fields.name: url
sub_fields.instructions: Add a URL here if you want the image to link to another page.
